name: 🔦🔫
description:
Awkwardly stumble through dark, zombie-filled halls with a friend,
when only one of you has a flashlight.

~15 Minutes Long Online/Local Co-op Zombie Thingie, 2 Player only
well okay you can play it solo if you want to but i don't recommend it

👀

Troubleshooting:
if you're stuck on "Connecting...",
check for browser extensions that could be blocking WebRTC (some VPN's do that)
it may also be blocked by your router or ISP, and there's nothing i can do about it (sorry!)

<3

Made with:
Heaps, Echo, LDTK, m3x6, monogram
